innā fataḥnā laka fatḥan mubīnan
liyaghfira laka al-lahu mā taqaddama min dhanbika wamā ta-akhara wayutimma niʿ'matahu ʿalayka wayahdiyaka ṣirāṭan mus'taqīman
wayanṣuraka al-lahu naṣran ʿazīzan
huwa alladhī anzala al-sakīnata fī qulūbi al-mu'minīna liyazdādū īmānan maʿa īmānihim walillahi junūdu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wakāna al-lahu ʿalīman ḥakīman
liyud'khila al-mu'minīna wal-mu'mināti jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā wayukaffira ʿanhum sayyiātihim wakāna dhālika ʿinda al-lahi fawzan ʿaẓīman

wayuʿadhiba al-munāfiqīna wal-munāfiqāti wal-mush'rikīna wal-mush'rikāti al-ẓānīna bil-lahi ẓanna al-sawi ʿalayhim dāiratu al-sawi waghaḍiba al-lahu ʿalayhim walaʿanahum wa-aʿadda lahum jahannama wasāat maṣīran
walillahi junūdu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wakāna al-lahu ʿazīzan ḥakīman
innā arsalnāka shāhidan wamubashiran wanadhīran
litu'minū bil-lahi warasūlihi watuʿazzirūhu watuwaqqirūhu watusabbiḥūhu buk'ratan wa-aṣīlan
inna alladhīna yubāyiʿūnaka innamā yubāyiʿūna al-laha yadu al-lahi fawqa aydīhim faman nakatha fa-innamā yankuthu ʿalā nafsihi waman awfā bimā ʿāhada ʿalayhu al-laha fasayu'tīhi ajran ʿaẓīman

sayaqūlu laka al-mukhalafūna mina al-aʿrābi shaghalatnā amwālunā wa-ahlūnā fa-is'taghfir lanā yaqūlūna bi-alsinatihim mā laysa fī qulūbihim qul faman yamliku lakum mina al-lahi shayan in arāda bikum ḍarran aw arāda bikum nafʿan bal kāna al-lahu bimā taʿmalūna khabīran
bal ẓanantum an lan yanqaliba al-rasūlu wal-mu'minūna ilā ahlīhim abadan wazuyyina dhālika fī qulūbikum waẓanantum ẓanna al-sawi wakuntum qawman būran
waman lam yu'min bil-lahi warasūlihi fa-innā aʿtadnā lil'kāfirīna saʿīran
walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi yaghfiru liman yashāu wayuʿadhibu man yashāu wakāna al-lahu ghafūran raḥīman

sayaqūlu al-mukhalafūna idhā inṭalaqtum ilā maghānima litakhudhūhā dharūnā nattabiʿ'kum yurīdūna an yubaddilū kalāma al-lahi qul lan tattabiʿūnā kadhālikum qāla al-lahu min qablu fasayaqūlūna bal taḥsudūnanā bal kānū lā yafqahūna illā qalīlan

qul lil'mukhallafīna mina al-aʿrābi satud'ʿawna ilā qawmin ulī basin shadīdin tuqātilūnahum aw yus'limūna fa-in tuṭīʿū yu'tikumu al-lahu ajran ḥasanan wa-in tatawallaw kamā tawallaytum min qablu yuʿadhib'kum ʿadhāban alīman

laysa ʿalā al-aʿmā ḥarajun walā ʿalā al-aʿraji ḥarajun walā ʿalā al-marīḍi ḥarajun waman yuṭiʿi al-laha warasūlahu yud'khil'hu jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru waman yatawalla yuʿadhib'hu ʿadhāban alīman
laqad raḍiya al-lahu ʿani al-mu'minīna idh yubāyiʿūnaka taḥta al-shajarati faʿalima mā fī qulūbihim fa-anzala al-sakīnata ʿalayhim wa-athābahum fatḥan qarīban
wamaghānima kathīratan yakhudhūnahā wakāna al-lahu ʿazīzan ḥakīman
waʿadakumu al-lahu maghānima kathīratan takhudhūnahā faʿajjala lakum hādhihi wakaffa aydiya al-nāsi ʿankum walitakūna āyatan lil'mu'minīna wayahdiyakum ṣirāṭan mus'taqīman
wa-ukh'rā lam taqdirū ʿalayhā qad aḥāṭa al-lahu bihā wakāna al-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīran
walaw qātalakumu alladhīna kafarū lawallawū al-adbāra thumma lā yajidūna waliyyan walā naṣīran
sunnata al-lahi allatī qad khalat min qablu walan tajida lisunnati al-lahi tabdīlan
wahuwa alladhī kaffa aydiyahum ʿankum wa-aydiyakum ʿanhum bibaṭni makkata min baʿdi an aẓfarakum ʿalayhim wakāna al-lahu bimā taʿmalūna baṣīran

humu alladhīna kafarū waṣaddūkum ʿani al-masjidi al-ḥarāmi wal-hadya maʿkūfan an yablugha maḥillahu walawlā rijālun mu'minūna wanisāon mu'minātun lam taʿlamūhum an taṭaūhum fatuṣībakum min'hum maʿarratun bighayri ʿil'min liyud'khila al-lahu fī raḥmatihi man yashāu law tazayyalū laʿadhabnā alladhīna kafarū min'hum ʿadhāban alīman

idh jaʿala alladhīna kafarū fī qulūbihimu al-ḥamiyata ḥamiyyata al-jāhiliyati fa-anzala al-lahu sakīnatahu ʿalā rasūlihi waʿalā al-mu'minīna wa-alzamahum kalimata al-taqwā wakānū aḥaqqa bihā wa-ahlahā wakāna al-lahu bikulli shayin ʿalīman

laqad ṣadaqa al-lahu rasūlahu al-ru'yā bil-ḥaqi latadkhulunna al-masjida al-ḥarāma in shāa al-lahu āminīna muḥalliqīna ruūsakum wamuqaṣṣirīna lā takhāfūna faʿalima mā lam taʿlamū fajaʿala min dūni dhālika fatḥan qarīban
huwa alladhī arsala rasūlahu bil-hudā wadīni al-ḥaqi liyuẓ'hirahu ʿalā al-dīni kullihi wakafā bil-lahi shahīdan

muḥammadun rasūlu al-lahi wa-alladhīna maʿahu ashiddāu ʿalā al-kufāri ruḥamāu baynahum tarāhum rukkaʿan sujjadan yabtaghūna faḍlan mina al-lahi wariḍ'wānan sīmāhum fī wujūhihim min athari al-sujūdi dhālika mathaluhum fī al-tawrāti wamathaluhum fī al-injīli kazarʿin akhraja shaṭahu faāzarahu fa-is'taghlaẓa fa-is'tawā ʿalā sūqihi yuʿ'jibu al-zurāʿa liyaghīẓa bihimu al-kufāra waʿada al-lahu alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti min'hum maghfiratan wa-ajran ʿaẓīman
